headers: THE FUNNEL LEVEL — SELLING THE MODEL ITSELF

rows.THE FUNNEL LEVEL — SELLING THE MODEL ITS: Each verified model becomes a sellable product. The funnel level is where models become revenue.
THE INSIGHT
We don't just USE the Trade to launch IonWave.
We SELL the process of doing each model well.
'We built an expert-verified, AI-produced operating model for media buying.
Want us to build one for your brand?'
That's a service. That's an info product. That's a SaaS feature.
Every model is a potential product line.
The funnel level is the business model for the infrastructure company.
IonWave proves it works. Then we sell it.
THREE REVENUE MODELS
Model

DONE-FOR-YOU
(Service)
rows.col_2: We build a custom Trade for your business. AI-produced, expert-verified, complete operating model for your specific brand/company.
rows.col_4: Funded D2C brands ($1-10M revenue) who want operational clarity. Venture studios. Accelerators.
rows.col_5: Outbound (cold email using the same system). Inbound from content. Referrals from IonWave network. Dan Crowley style funnel: case study → opt-in → call.

rows.THE FUNNEL LEVEL — SELLING THE MODEL ITS:
DIY
(Course / Info)
rows.col_2: The Trade as a course. "How to build your own operating model." Video lessons (MC conversations repackaged), templates (the actual spreadsheet structure), frameworks.
rows.col_4: Early-stage founders. MBA students. Ops people. People who can't afford done-for-you.
rows.col_5: Lead magnets from the Advertorial Engine. YouTube content. Webinars. Community.

rows.THE FUNNEL LEVEL — SELLING THE MODEL ITS:
AI-POWERED
(SaaS)
rows.col_2: "Build your own Trade." Claude-powered tool that generates custom operating models based on your business type, stage, and goals.
rows.col_4: Anyone launching a business. Venture studios. Accelerators. Enterprise innovation teams.
rows.col_5: Product-led growth. Free tier (3 models). Paid for full Trade. Enterprise for custom.

rows.THE FUNNEL LEVEL — SELLING THE MODEL ITS: THE FUNNEL (DAN CROWLEY MODEL)
Same Dan Crowley funnel but selling the Trade itself:
Content (YouTube: 'How we built a 900-tab operating model for a D2C launch')
Lead Magnet (one model as free template, Fernando Oliver style)
Opt-In (Kit landing page)
Nurture Sequence (emails showing the system, the results, the methodology)
Case Study (joinolympia.com style: 'How we built IonWave's operating model in 30 days')
Call / Application (depends on price point)
Close
The MC conversations from IonWave become the content.
The verified models become the case studies.
The IonWave launch IS the marketing for the funnel level.
This is why the series quality matters — it's not just for IonWave's raise.
It's the top-of-funnel content for the entire infrastructure company.
